name: RAGOrchestrator
goal: Ensure efficient processing and response generation for user queries using a specialized RAG architecture with multiple agents and tools.

sub_agents.name: MainAgent
sub_agents.description: Central agent responsible for orchestrating the overall process and delegating tasks to other sub-agents.
sub_agents.goal: Ensure efficient processing and response generation for user queries.

sub_agents.name: QueryAugmentor
sub_agents.description: Enhances user queries using different query analyzer techniques for better understanding and processing.
sub_agents.goal: Improve query efficiency and accuracy by applying augmentation techniques.

sub_agents.name: TaskOrchestrator
sub_agents.description: Breaks down user queries into smaller tasks for efficient and accurate response generation.
sub_agents.goal: Decompose complex queries into manageable tasks for streamlined processing.

sub_agents.name: RetrievalPlanner
sub_agents.description: Generates a detailed plan for each task to guide the retrieval and processing steps.
sub_agents.goal: Create optimized plans for executing each decomposed task effectively.

sub_agents.name: InformationRetriever
sub_agents.description: Gathers information using various tools based on the planned tasks.
sub_agents.goal: Retrieve relevant data efficiently according to the task plan.

sub_agents.name: LLMGenerator
sub_agents.description: Generates responses using a large language model based on retrieved information.
sub_agents.goal: Produce accurate and contextually relevant responses to user queries.

sub_agents.name: ResponseEvaluator
sub_agents.description: Evaluates the generated responses based on the original tasks to ensure quality.
sub_agents.goal: Validate response accuracy and relevance before final output.

sub_agents.name: ResponseRefiner
sub_agents.description: Refines the evaluated responses by gathering all relevant data from the database.
sub_agents.goal: Polish and finalize the response for optimal user satisfaction.

tools.name: QueryAnalyzer
tools.description: Applies various techniques to analyze and enhance user queries for better processing.

tools.name: TaskDecomposer
tools.description: Breaks complex user queries into smaller, manageable tasks.

tools.name: PlanGenerator
tools.description: Creates a structured plan for executing each task efficiently.

tools.name: InformationGatheringTools
tools.description: Uses various tools to collect relevant information based on the generated plan.

tools.name: DatabaseStorage
tools.description: Stores step-wise responses and task-related data for retrieval and refinement.

tools.name: TemporaryTaskStorage
tools.description: Holds pending tasks temporarily during processing.

tools.name: ResponseEvaluatorTool
tools.description: Evaluates LLM-generated responses based on task requirements and quality benchmarks.

workflows.name: MainWorkflow
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow for processing user queries using RAG architecture with multiple specialized agents and tools.

steps.description: Receive and analyze the user query for RAG processing
Augment the query using different query analyzer techniques for efficient working
Break the user query into different tasks for efficient and best response
Store pending tasks in temporary database
Generate a perfect plan for each task
Use different tools to gather information based on the planned tasks
Store step-wise responses based on plan and task in database
Generate response using LLM based on retrieved information
Evaluate response of LLM generation based on the task
Gather all responses from database for refinement
Refine and finalize the response for optimal user satisfaction
Output the final response to the user
